sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.TemplateSlotProvider</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>TemplateSlotProvider</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TemplateSlotProvider = Class.create();
TemplateSlotProvider.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
    getFilteredSlotsByTemplateId: function() {
		var templateId = current.view_config.template;
		//return if the templateId value is empty (this causes all template slots to be returned)
		if(!templateId)
			return;

		return 'view_template=' + templateId;
    },
    type: 'TemplateSlotProvider'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-10-15 13:30:52</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>97a3e9b2ff331010df65c65e793bf191</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>TemplateSlotProvider</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Mobile plugin" source="com.glide.sg">0ced34cb6d2220100acb70b3534330d3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_97a3e9b2ff331010df65c65e793bf191</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-10-26 16:18:42</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>414</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
